Alert.name: QuickSign - Annulations importantes

settings.description: Alerte si le nombre d'annulation devient trop important

extra_config.query: "environnement"="EXP" wssignature -(source_module=iis_log_in)  ("QS SignatureCancel" OR "Signature Cancel") | chart count() as NBDemandesAnnulations

settings.name: QuickSign - Annulations importantes

notifications.email_template:
Service : QuickSign / signature Electronique

Le nombre d'annulation semble important sur la dernière heure. Vérifier l'état des services QuickSign
notifications.subject: Quicksign - Signature Electronique - Nombre d'annulations important

livesearch_data.query: "environnement"="EXP" wssignature -(source_module=iis_log_in)  ("QS SignatureCancel" OR "Signature Cancel") | chart count() as NBDemandesAnnulations
livesearch_data.description: Alerte si le nombre d'annulation devient trop important
livesearch_data.searchname: QuickSign - Annulations importantes

query_info.lucene_query: (((environnement:EXP AND wssignature) AND ((-(source_module:iis_log_in)))) AND (("QS SignatureCancel" OR "Signature Cancel")))

Alert.name: Alerte WSSanteOciane

settings.description: Latence sur WSSanteOciane

settings.name: Alerte WSSanteOciane

notifications.email_template:

{% for row in rows %}

{% endfor%}
notifications.subject: Latence WSSanteOciane

livesearch_data.query: repo_name=IUT source_module="iis_log_in" repo_name="IUT" (event_source="*WSSAnte*" OR resource="*WSSAnte*") environnement=EXP | chart avg(duration) by device_name
livesearch_data.description: Latence sur WSSanteOciane
livesearch_data.searchname: Alerte WSSanteOciane

query_info.query_filter: repo_name=IUT source_module="iis_log_in" repo_name="IUT" (event_source="*WSSAnte*" OR resource="*WSSAnte*") environnement=EXP
query_info.lucene_query: (((((repo_name:IUT) AND source_module:iis_log_in) AND (repo_name:IUT)) AND ((event_source:*WSSAnte* OR resource:*WSSAnte*))) AND environnement:EXP)

Alert.name: synthese_lente

notifications.email_template:
Bonjour,

{% for row in rows %}

Vous recevez ce mail car le compte : {{row.dst_user}} a été utilisé par : {{row.src_user}} depuis le Hostname : {{row.src_host}} via l'adresse ip : {{row.src_adr}} le : {{row.time}} 

{%endfor%}

Sur les 15 dernières minutes.

Vous pouvez visualiser l'évènement en cliqaunt sur le lien "Searche Link" ci-dessous.

Cordialement,
notifications.subject: [ALERTE] MATMUT - ACTIVE DIRECTORY - UTILISATION DU COMPTE AMELIE POULAIN POSTE ILLEGITIME

extra_config.query:
[user="poulain.amelie" source_address=* | process dns(source_address) as Hostname | search -Hostname="srv*" -Hostname="sci*" -Hostname="zrv*" -Hostname="zci*" -Hostname="localhost."| SEARCH -not_resolved_host IN MATMUT_LST_SRV_ALLOWPOULAINT1 | norm on Hostname <machine:"([A-Za-z]{2}[0-9]{5}|[bB]{1}[0-9]{6})"> | search machine="*"] as s1   
join 
[workstation="*"]  as s2  
on s2.workstation = s1.machine | rename s1.log_ts as utime | process eval("time=strftime(utime, 'dd/MM/YYYY hh:mm:ss', 'GMT+2:00' )")  | rename s2.user as src_user | rename s1.source_address as src_adr | rename s1.machine as src_host | rename s1.event_id as evt | rename s1.message as message | rename s1.user as dst_user | chart count() by time, src_user, src_adr, src_host, evt, message, dst_user order by time DESC

settings.description: This alert is triggered if the recent element file that points to an .ISO, .IMG, .VHD or .VHDX files are created.
